extendedInfo.description: Run your own Monster Pet Shop that grows, exhibits, and sells fantastic magical creatures. Play with, care and feed your creatures to maximize happiness. Happy creatures award more money when you find them good homes. Customize your Monster Pet Shop with three different habitats â Dirt, Grass and Water, and unlock ever more wonderful creatures by cross breeding with your friendsâ collection.------------------------- Players can collect upwards of 25 different monster types and over 100 unique looking monsters.- Multiple classes and habitats including dirt, water and grass monsters- Care for your monster pets by petting them, cleaning their homes and feeding them- Grow and breed unique monsters for show- Play online with your friends to share eggs and grow your collection------------------------Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/BeelineGamesFollow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/BeelineGamesFollow us on Youtube: www.youtube.com/BeelineGamesThe Android robot is reproduced or modified from work created and shared by Google and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 3.0 Attribution License."

reviews.title: Best Game Ever
reviews.comment: Outstanding game great fun great quality!
reviews.author: Trinity Rogers

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: I loved this game tell yesterday I installed the update and when I tried to open it today it said application not installed, so round three of starting all over again, if this continues I\'m done with it. Sucks cuz its actually a fun cute game for me and my kids...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs to fix bugs
reviews.comment: Game crashes all the time now it won\'t let me get through to the main menu..it all started when I reached level 14..there\'s hardly any updates to fix bugs
reviews.author: jesus araujo

reviews.title: It an awesome game I wish that you make lots like it more
reviews.comment: Its a wonderful game I wish you the best and you are the first game I have ever rated so that\'s how good this game is
reviews.author: Hamany Alroumi

reviews.comment: This would be a five star game but all of a sudden after months of playing it won\'t open and blacks out at the main screen which only displays play and no other options. So what am I suppose to do?  Now I have eggs hatching and no berries to recover them!!!
reviews.author: Nicole May

reviews.title: So much fun!
reviews.comment: So much fun! I love playing this game. No glitches so far. Easy for kids to play too and very appropriate for all age groups!
reviews.author: Emily Combs

reviews.title: Disaster
reviews.comment: My game won\'t even load after the update.  I have a lot of time & money invested in this game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This app is great it teches you and its fun there is alot of fantastic monster that are amazing colors
reviews.author: Floren Amesquita

reviews.title: Great Game, but...
reviews.comment: I really enjoy playing this game, but it should be lots easier to earn free berries. If we could earn free berries by watching videos, like most other apps, it would be an even better game.
reviews.author: Katie Wilkinson

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Log the game and would be five stars just cant connect to add friends off of android based phone
reviews.author: Bryan Shu

reviews.title: Wtf.
reviews.comment: Why does this game keep on killing my progress! And I had a monster berry tree that didn\'t make berrys and I paied 5.00 for it! I WANT MY MONEY BACK!!! WTF!!! >:(
reviews.author: sara craven

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: Ever since the end of July and the first of August the game says I\'ve been playing around with the time, not happy so not happy
reviews.author: David Prendergast

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.comment: I love it!!!!! Its so time consuming. Great if you\'re bored in school or at work.
reviews.author: Brianna Oliver

reviews.title: Really good pet game...
reviews.comment: Need to have some way of gaining currency during pet growth.
reviews.author: Giovanni Prayag

reviews.title: Paid for more berries and got shorted 100
reviews.comment: Bought berries a total of 3 times and only got 125 berries instead of the 225 I should have gotten! Fix for future users because you\'ve lost this user
reviews.author: Jennie Hawk

reviews.title: Super apps:-)
reviews.comment: Love this game but still i dont have neighbor my frends dont play dis game...and its really hard to get berries...im on level ten with six pets..hope theres features like convert coins to berries...fufu
reviews.author: arjel escalona

reviews.comment: This game is okay. It\'s cute but you can\'t really get anywhere unless you are willing to spend real money. Also, the creatures take forever to grow
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Monster Pet Shop
reviews.comment: So fun that it\'s addicting, but ever since the last update it won\'t load!!!  I get to the Play screen, but the game won\'t open past that. HELP!!!!!!
reviews.author: C Lind

reviews.title: A great time killer
reviews.comment: The monsters are all so cute and it really is a great game to kill some time. I just wish there was better way to get more berries besides just buying them.
reviews.author: Mary Johnson

reviews.title: Game keeps closing
reviews.comment: The game is great and i love it my three old son loves the gloop monsters but every once in awhile the game closes and i have to restart it other then that great game wish you would make it easy to get free berry
reviews.author: Geneva Topping
